title: English Language Proficiency Standards for Adult Education (AIR)
subject: English Language Proficiency (ELP) Standards

speech and writing.

A2F8859D82B94D43A493C5AE8C61D675.description: Using context, questioning, and consistent knowledge of English morphology, determine the meaning of general academic and content-specific words and phrases, figurative and connotative language, and idiomatic expressions in spoken and written texts about a variety of topics, expreiences, or events

D66022F91B51471E98605C5CE71B1445.description: By the end of ELP Level 5, an ELL can...

C02667A2813E4261BDA9639B756DD11D.description: Using context, questioning, and an increasing knowledge of English morphology, determine the meaning of general academic and content-specific words and phrases, figurative and connotative language, and a growing number of idiomatic expressions in spoken and written texts about a variety of topics, expriences or events

68F00FE743E942C4B36C08B0186354B9.description: By the end of ELP Level 4, an ELL can...

AC5DD173046E40BE9C70ECF5526F030A.description: Using context, questioning, and a developing knowledge of English and their native language's morphology, determing the meaning of general academic and content-specific words and phrases and frequetnly occurring expressions in spoken and written texts about familiar topics, experiences, or events

3DDC0A02EBA342E6AC70F3F5F472EC4E.description: By the end of ELP Level 3, an ELL can...

CFC32245BA514D749F62BED7069969CA.description: Using context, questioning, and knowledge of morphology in their native language, determine the meaning of frequently occurring words, phrases, and expressions in spoken and written texts about familiar topics, experiences, or events

B32CB45F71524213B7B785897722E381.description: By the end of ELP Level 2, an ELL can...

B9849BE953D241F4B2BA6F9D4B90A3DC.description: Relying heavily on context, questioning, and knowledge of morphology in their native language, recognize the meaning of a few frequently occurring words, simple phrases, and formulaic expressions in written texts about familiar topics, experiences, and events
